title: BUT I KNOW WHOM I HAVE BELIEVED
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: I know not why God's wondrous grace
To me He hath made known,
Nor why— unworthy— Christ in love
v2: I know not how this saving faith
Nor how believing in His Word
v3: I know not how the Spirit moves,
v4: I know not what of good or ill
Of weary ways or golden days,
v5: I know not when my Lord may come,
Nor if I'll walk the vale with Him,
Or meet Him in the air.
c1: But "I know Whom I have believed
And am persuaded that He is able
To keep that which I've committed
